channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: With New E.U. Loan, Ukraine Avoids Budget Crunch and Can Plan War Effort
item.description: The loan will cover two-thirds of the country’s financial needs for the next two years. It also bolsters Ukraine’s position in ongoing peace talks.

item.title: Putin Reaffirms Broad Military Goals for Russia in Ukraine
item.description: President Vladimir V. Putin spoke at an annual news conference that highlights his grip over Russia and often sets the Kremlin’s tone for the next yea...

item.title: It's the last news quiz of the year! Will you go out on top?
item.description: This week, we've got annoying holiday movies, chatty White House insiders, and cheese.

item.title: Brown University shooting suspect found dead. And Epstein files release deadline looms
item.description: The man suspected of fatally shooting two students at Brown University has been found dead. And, today is the Justice Department's deadline to release...

item.title: In the shadow of U.S. export controls, China rallies its own chip industry
item.description: The chip industry in China is hustling to overcome a Western tech choke hold, even as President Trump appears poised to loosen U.S. chip restrictions.

item.title: Brown University Shooting Suspect Found Dead, and Trump Eases Marijuana Restrictions

item.title: Mexico’s Security Chief on His Fight Against the Cartels
item.description: Omar García Harfuch spoke to The New York Times about the country’s aggressive cartel offensive and his relationship with the White House.

item.title: Trump’s New Marijuana Policy Offers an Opportunity
item.description: Marijuana has been tied to psychosis and other health problems. I still think it’s safer than alcohol.
